item.title: Disrupt Deal Days are here: Prime savings for TechCrunch Disrupt 2024!
item.description:
Get ready for a prime week of savings at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024 with the launch of Disrupt Deal Days! From now to July 19 at 11:59 p.m. PT, we’re going back to early-bird ticket prices, allowing attendees to save up to $800 on their passes. This limited-time offer is the perfect opportunity to secure your […]

item.title: Artists should exploit AI’s capabilities, say creators of new Tate Modern show
item.description:
Exhibition traces long relationship between artists and technology, a symbiosis that is likely to continue

Artists should see the advance of AI technology as an opportunity and not a new existential threat for creativity, according to the team behind Tate Modern’s new tech-based show.

Catherine Wood, the museum’s director of exhibitions and programmes, said the Electric Dreams exhibition showed the decades-long relationship between artists and technology – and the fact the two worlds would probably always be intertwined.

Continue reading...

item.title: It's official: Best Buy's Black Friday in July sale is here and coming for Prime Day
item.description: Best Buy's Black Friday in July is here runs through Wednesday. Plus, a lot of summer deals are already live, like a $449 75-inch Toshiba TV.

item.title: Amazon adds 3 big free Prime Day video games, including 'Suicide Squad.' How to claim them.
item.description: For 48 hours, Amazon Prime members can claim a trio of free games, including 'Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League.'

item.title: Snag $125 off the Dyson Airwrap bundle ahead of Prime Day
item.description: As of July 15, you can get the Dyson Airwrap bundle for $549.99, down from $674.99 at Amazon. That's a 19% discount of $125.
